articles.title: View from the Green Room: Unfinished business on The Ribbon Road
articles.description: The success of the drama lies in the range and appeal of all the minor characters
articles.content:
REVIEW: The Ribbon Road at Halla Colmáin, An tSean-Phobail
Aisteoirí an tSean-Phobail bounces us back to the sixties with “The Ribbon Road”, a folk-drama of Travellers and local folk at the parish hall in Old Parish.

articles.description: The Philippine Consulate General in Los Angeles is closely monitoring the large-scale immigration operations currently being conducted by US federal authorities across multiple locations in the California city, sparking tension and public protests.
